blogPost.excerpt: Hire anyone in LATAM legally in seconds. We enable HR teams to easily manage paperwork, compliance and payments for distributed teams all over LATAM.
blogPost.body: Hire anyone in LATAM legally in seconds. We enable HR teams to easily manage paperwork, compliance and payments for distributed teams all over LATAM.
blogPost.title: Ontop - Multi-country payroll manager for LATAM
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 在几秒钟内合法地雇用拉美地区的任何人。我们使人力资源团队能够轻松地管理整个拉美地区分布式团队的文书工作、合规性和支付。
localize.tagline: 拉丁美洲多国薪金经理

localize.description: 在幾秒鐘內合法地僱用拉美地區的任何人。我們使人力資源團隊能夠輕鬆地管理整個拉美地區分佈式團隊的文書工作、合規性和支付。
localize.tagline: 拉丁美洲多國薪金經理

previous.excerpt: We use software that scrapes the Internet to figure out which stocks are being mentioned more often. We filter through the noise and dig deep into 2-3 stocks. A weekly report is delivered straight to your inbox every Wednesday 9am sharp (PST).
previous.title: Ticker Nerd - Analysing hot stocks before the hype train arrives

localize.description: 我们用软件在互联网上搜刮，找出哪些股票被提及的频率较高。我们从噪音中过滤出来，深入挖掘2-3只股票。每周三上午9点整（太平洋标准时间），我们会将周报直接发送到您的收件箱。
localize.tagline: 在炒作列车到来前分析热点股

localize.description: 我們用軟件在互聯網上搜刮，找出哪些股票被提及的頻率較高。我們從噪音中過濾出來，深入挖掘2-3只股票。每週三上午9點整（太平洋標準時間），我們會將週報直接發送到您的收件箱。
localize.tagline: 在炒作列車到來前分析熱點股

该股在去年上涨了38%。
